notes: Leone (DL/GL in North America) compact car. First Subaru models widely sold in North American market. Available in multiple body styles. Front-wheel drive standard, part-time four-wheel drive optional on some models. Established Subaru's presence in U.S. market. Data sourced from Wikipedia Subaru Leone article, December 19, 2024 revision.

Bi-drive Recreational All-terrain Transporter (BRAT) compact pickup launched 1978. Features open bed with rear-facing jump seats to circumvent chicken tax on light trucks. Available with FWD or part-time 4WD. Unique and practical vehicle that became cult classic. Data sourced from Wikipedia Subaru BRAT article, December 19, 2024 revision.
